body_html:
And this is an error I got with allow_soft_placement = False :

InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'stack': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available.
[[Node: stack = Pack[N=4, T=DT_INT64, axis=0, _device="/device:GPU:0"](mul_1, floordiv, floordiv_1, mul_3)]]

body:
And this is an error I got with allow_soft_placement = False : 

> InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Cannot assign a device to node 'stack': Could not satisfy explicit device specification '/device:GPU:0' because no supported kernel for GPU devices is available.
	 [[Node: stack = Pack[N=4, T=DT_INT64, axis=0, _device="/device:GPU:0"](mul_1, floordiv, floordiv_1, mul_3)]]
